markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Call to Axis](/Actions.aspx?ID=731) <actions string="Free Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency** once per day

**Requirements** You are about to attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26).

</column>

---

You call upon the knowledge of Axis to ensure the accuracy of your information. You roll a second time and use the higher result. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
name: Call to Axis
requirement: You are about to attempt a check to  Recall Knowledge .
requirement_markdown: You are about to attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26).
